meanings.definition: Andro- relating to or characteristic of men or male animals
meanings.sent1: The andro lion roared loudly in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: He had an andro haircut, short and neat.
meanings.sent3: The andro squirrel challenged the other animals to a race.
meanings.sent4: His andro strength helped him lift the heavy rock effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The andro voice of the actor made him perfect for the role.

meanings.definition: Andro- combining form meaning male or masculine
meanings.sent1: The androgram showed the male characteristics of the patient.
meanings.sent2: The androcentric society favored men over women.
meanings.sent3: The androphone was specifically designed for male voices.
meanings.sent4: His androtype was evident in his strong features.
meanings.sent5: The andrology clinic specialized in male reproductive health.
